creator: randy.hoffman@schoolspecialty.com
text:
When binding to ip aliases on the same machine, same nic, localhost is bound to 
as well.  Example...

server address - 10.10.10.1
alias 1 - 10.10.10.2
alias 2 - 10.10.10.3

When running an instance of tomcat binding on alias 1, localhost also gets 
bound on same port.
When running another instance of tomcat on alias 2, same port, startup fails 
because attempted bind of localhost fails even though address to use is alias 2.

The fix will be present in 4.1.1.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 8828 ***
